info.description:
# Federated Talk Link
This app allows you to generate federated links to Nextcloud Talk rooms hosted on external Nextcloud servers.
## Features
- Query external Nextcloud Talk servers to find rooms by name - Generate direct call links for federated access - Admin settings to configure external server credentials - Integration with Nextcloud Talk call settings
## Configuration
1. Go to Admin Settings > Federated Talk Link 2. Configure the external server URL 3. Add authentication credentials 4. Set the target Nextcloud URL for generated links
## Usage
Once configured, you can generate federated links by providing the room name. The app will query the external server and return a direct link to the call.
